scripts.build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && rimraf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rimraf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.apk-debug: npm run clean && npm run build && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.apk: npm run clean && npm run build && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && cd android && gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.rebuild: react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --dev false --reset-cache --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.ios: npm run clean && react-native run-ios --simulator="iPhone X"
scripts.clean:ios: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache verify && npm install && npm start -- --reset-cache
